trade_race_title: Trade KOGE with Binance Web3 Wallet and Win Fee Rewards!
trade_race_time_desc: From 00:00 UTC, Monday, June 16, 2025 To 23:59 UTC, Sunday, June 22, 2025
trade_race_rule_desc1: Eligible Trade Volume:Only KOGE buy transactions executed via the Binance Web3 Wallet (Keyless Wallet) through a direct swap interaction with the binanceDEXRouter upon  KOGE/USDT(USDC,USD1 as well since #7 ) will be counted, including LiquidMesh/PCS/1inch etc.
trade_race_rule_desc2: Note: Due to DEX aggregator routing, a single swap may interact with multiple liquidity pools. Therefore, the recorded volume based on the above criteria may be lower than the total transaction amount. This is expected behavior.
trade_race_rule_desc3: Reward Pool Calculation:Reward Pool = {{rate}}% of the total trading fees earned by 48Club's liquidity position on this trading pair during the event period.
trade_race_rule_desc4: The reward pool is funded solely from fees collected by 48Club's LP. Fees earned by LPs not operated by the organizer are excluded from the reward pool.
trade_race_rule_desc5: Reward Distribution: The top keyless wallet addresses whose valid trading volume exceeding {{min_usdt}} USD daily (including) in average, will equally share the reward pool.
trade_race_reward_desc1: Rewards can be claimed no later than 7 days after the end of each event.
trade_race_reward_desc2: Winners can be queried on the platform.
trade_race_reward_desc4: Check your ranking and claim history anytime on the event page!
trade_race_note_desc1: 48Club reserves the right to terminate the event with 24-hour notice
trade_race_note_desc2: Participation implies agreement with the event rules and 48Club's final interpretation rights
trade_race_note_desc3: If the event is extended, updates will be posted at least 24 hours before the current event ends
trade_race_leaderboard_commit: The leaderboard is coming soon, please stay tuned!
trade_race_eventdata_commit: Event data will be available soon, please stay tuned!
search_address_tip: Enter your address to check if you won the airdrop
search_address_tip2: After UTC 2025-06-08 00:00:00, you can query the results of the airdrop
error: Transaction Failed, Please try again later
